thread.title: 3m NHS Fraud - NHS Training Manager awards spurious contract
thread.title_full: 3m NHS Fraud - NHS Training Manager awards spurious contract

title: 3m NHS Fraud - NHS Training Manager awards spurious contract
text: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-leeds-3445947... Reading this, I am appalled that an NHS Manager, his Wife and friends can commit fraud to this scale for 8 plus years before being detected. When will the NHS introduce robust procedures with appropriate checks and balances to reduce years of continuos fraud like this.Utter parasites. They have a robust tendering process designed to stop this happening, lessons will be learnt, processes will be reviewed etc...But no, its the big bad tories killing the nhs, not the bunch of crooks that work there.
